Pet Rules (Originals)

	


Any of these for any friendly or festive 
purposes is allowed.

Cloning the entire pet or parts of the pet
is allowed.

Making mixes with remixed clones 
or unremixed clones is approved.

Distribution of these is allowed:
"mixes with remixed or unremixed clones", 
"remixed clones", 
"clones"

~ BGraceful
